Header: “Speaker is preparing to become PM” – MP Mahindananda Aluthgamage
Content: Colombo (News1st): UPFA MP Mahindananda Aluthgamage noted that President Maithripala Sirisena had clearly stated that he will never appoint Ranil Wickremesinghe as Prime Minister and therefore the UNP is currently facing a crisis. “Speaker Karu Jayasuriya is preparing to become the Prime minister and Champika Ranawaka has given his name saying that he is the most suitable candidate to be the Prime Minister, while “Wickremesinghe’s butterfly gang states that he will be the Prime minister,” said MP Aluthgamage. He stated that the TNA is supporting Ranil Wickremesinghe to become the Prime Minister by imposing terms in order to pave the way to create a Federal Constitution. MP Aluthgamahe states that Ranil Wickremesinghe has finally remembered god, who he forgot was watching while he robbed the Central bank and when the country was destroyed. “But now, Ranil Wickremesinghe has remembered god. Because he knows that the god will punish him if this worsens.” – MP Mahindananda Aluthgamage
